storyInfo: To purchase a new instrument, Ebenholz and Kreide put themselves at risk and enter the Cliffy Patio, an area off-limits to the Infected. Once again, they ask Czerny to assess the fruits of their practice.

attributes.content: Let me see... That's right, this is the place.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Isn't this place too ornate to be a music store?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Of course – this is the best music store in all of Vyseheim. Otherwise, I wouldn't have brought you here.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: But, I didn't apply to enter the Cliffy Patio.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Those bureaucrats are so inefficient that by the time they process your application, the concert would already be over.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Plus, even if we do get found out, we'd only be looking at a fine.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I heard that if someone helps an Infected leave the Afterglow, the punishment for them is worse than for the Infected.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: What's there to be afraid of? It'll be fine.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Stand up straight and don't act skittish. Just don't let anyone be able to tell and we won't have any issues––
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Welcome, Mein Herr. Are you here to pick out an instrument, or...?
attributes.name: Inexperienced Clerk

attributes.content: Of course. Let's find ourselves a cello first.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Inexperienced Clerk

attributes.content: Who might this gentleman with you be?
attributes.name: Inexperienced Clerk

attributes.content: Him? He's my...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Mein Herr, I apologize for my rudeness, but I must remind you that those wearing unauthorized apparel are not allowed into the store.
attributes.name: Inexperienced Clerk

attributes.content: I'll go wait outside then.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Outside? What exactly are you afraid of, acting all suspicious? Don't tell me you––
attributes.name: Inexperienced Clerk

attributes.content: Do you have any idea upon whom you're casting aspersions? Unauthorized? Suspicious? How dare you use such words to describe a noble! Do you value your job or not?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: He's simply fallen on hard times, and has no choice but to dress plainly. His clothes are neither damaged nor dirty, so why would he not be allowed inside the store?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Excuse my rudeness, but this gentleman's attire does not match the store's required style of...
attributes.name: Inexperienced Clerk

attributes.content: Style?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: My–– cousin, has just suffered a great upheaval. His cello, which he cherished greatly, was destroyed in the turmoil.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I wanted to bring him here to buy a new cello as a way of expressing my condolences. What right do you have to spout nonsense about 'style?'
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I am terribly sorry about this, but it is store policy that all customers must be dressed appropriately.
attributes.name: Inexperienced Clerk

attributes.content: I'm sorry, but I cannot allow your companion to enter.
attributes.name: Inexperienced Clerk

attributes.content: Fine then!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Ebenholz takes off his cloak and drapes it over Kreide.
Now that he's wearing the same clothes as me, can he enter? Or, is my cloak somehow part of your inappropriate dress?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: If I put my cloak back on later, am I also not allowed to enter?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Inexperienced Clerk

attributes.content: I... I'll go ask the manager.
attributes.name: Inexperienced Clerk

attributes.content: This one can't just mind his own business!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Here, your coat...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: You're welcome.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: It was my idea to bring you here to buy a cello in the first place.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I'm bringing you inside the store one way or another, even if I have to pick a fight with that clerk.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: We would like to extend our sincerest apologies to both of you.
attributes.name: Inexperienced Clerk

attributes.content: The manager will be here shortly, and he will personally show you our instruments.
attributes.name: Inexperienced Clerk

attributes.content: Excuse me, are you busy right now?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Oh, it's Hibiscus!
attributes.name: Friendly Infected

attributes.content: I've got plenty of time.
attributes.name: Friendly Infected

attributes.content: It's about your condition...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I was worried that clerk was going to report us to the authorities...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Nonsense, it's not like he knew you were an Infected. He just saw your shoddy clothes and took you for a commoner–
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Tsk tsk... Looks like we forgot something.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: We did?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Our suits, of course.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Surely you don't plan to wear this onstage. It's too unprofessional.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Let's go. I'll find you the best tailor in all of Vyseheim––
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: No, I can't. During the fitting, the Originium crystals would...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: You do have a point.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: In that case––We'll find the best tailor in the Afterglow. How about it?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: The Sky is blue and fine...♪
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Alright, alright.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I can't thank you enough. For buying this cello for me, and for helping me order a suit!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: The cello's on me. And we haven't even gotten your clothes yet, nor do we know how they'll look on you. You can save your thanks for later.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: We'll know by tomorrow afternoon! I'm sure they'll fit just great!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: So, thank you!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Since we left the store, all you've been doing other than humming is thanking me. We've been over it a dozen times.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Hum, hum.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: The River murmurs clear...♪
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: This tune...
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I think I've heard it before... Or maybe I haven't. Never mind, it's probably just my imagination.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: By the way, you've studied the cello, so why don't you have one of your own? Did it break?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: The teacher who taught me how to play did give me a cello, but it didn't take long for someone to mess it up. Even though it's still sitting back at home, by the time I leave this city... I might only be able to bring the bow with me.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Just the bow? What's the purpose of that?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Seeing the bow is enough to remind me of my teacher.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I'm afraid that if I were to lose the bow, I might forget my teacher as well.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Forget? Don't you remember your teacher just fine?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Actually, I'm already starting to forget...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: My teacher was a nice Sankta lady with very long hair. She dressed plainly, and always had a smile on her face...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: I used to remember a lot more, as if she were standing right before my eyes... But not anymore.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: There are actually a lot of others I've wanted to remember...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: So, I need a few keepsakes, to make sure that I won't completely forget.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Keepsakes, huh...?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: What about right now? What do you plan to remember Czerny by?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I suppose a signature would do just fine.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: What about Hibiscus from Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: For Hibiscus, maybe an empty medicine bottle with the Rhodes Island logo?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Pfft. You're too easy to please.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: So long as it helps me remember, the actual object doesn't matter.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: What about me then? It'd be this cello, wouldn't it?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Maybe something else.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: The cello from my teacher didn't last very long. If this one also...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Fair enough.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I want to keep a coin that you gave me. Maybe punch a hole through it and wear it as a pendant. That sounds like a pretty good idea.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Money is how you'll remember me?!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Eh? Is there something wrong with that? Then, I'll pick something else...
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: No, no, it's a fine idea.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Shall we head back home and practice?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Actually, I was thinking... Why don't we pay a visit to Herr Czerny's first?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I'll pass. It's no secret that he gets all pissy when he sees me.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: I'm sure that's just a misunderstanding. It'll get cleared up.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: You've been saying that since the first day we met him.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Even if it really is some sort of misunderstanding, I think we're well beyond the point of clearing anything up. So yes, I'll pass after all.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: But Herr Czerny approved of you yesterday, didn't he?
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: All misunderstandings have to be resolved bit by bit.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Let's go. I want to see him so we can try out the cello you just got for me.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: It'd be a shame if such a wonderful instrument didn't have a knowledgeable audience.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Excuse me, are you busy right now?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus? Sorry, but now's not a very good time.
attributes.name: Skittish Infected

attributes.content: I'd just like you to answer a few questions.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You're also free to not answer if there's anything you're not comfortable disclosing.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You're not gonna take my blood?
attributes.name: Skittish Infected

attributes.content: I wouldn't do that without your consent.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Skittish Infected

attributes.content: I don't want to believe it, but this cello isn't something you can find in the Afterglow after one morning of shopping around.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: You went to the Cliffy Patio, didn't you?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I did.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Bold of you.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Actually... Ebenholz got into an argument with a store clerk just so I could go into the store.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: An argument? Did he think your clothes weren't fancy enough for the Cliffy Patio?
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: The clerk said something about 'not being able to enter the store unless dressed appropriately,' but do you see anything wrong with Kreide's attire? They were purposely fault-finding because Kreide was wearing commoner's clothes!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: So you, a noble, have begun to fight for the commoners.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I did it for Kreide!
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Regardless of whether he's a noble or a commoner, his skill is more than worthy of the instruments inside that store.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: To deny Kreide entry but to sell those magnificent wares to nobles who needlessly fill their shelves with them would be to treat the finest lumber as firewood.
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I didn't expect to hear those words out of your mouth.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Kreide, go ahead and get acquainted with your new instrument.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: I'll accompany Ebenholz and have him practice solo for a bit. Let's see if we can change some of his old habits.
attributes.name: Czerny

attributes.content: Change my habits...? I dare say––
attributes.name: Ebenholz

attributes.content: Yes, Herr Czerny!
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: (Whispers) See, all misunderstandings have to be resolved bit by bit.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: (Whispers) Herr Czerny's attitude is already changing. The rest is up to you.
attributes.name: Kreide

attributes.content: Hello—
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You that devil?
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: Git outta here. Do you have memory problems or somethin'?
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: Sorry to bother you.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: ––Git yer ass back here.
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: Did you need something?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You plannin' to go hide back in your office again, aren't you?
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You're being a bit unreasonable.
attributes.name: Coffee Shop Owner

attributes.content: Who the hell d'you think you are––
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: You still owe me quite a lot of coffee money, so who do you think I am?
attributes.name: Coffee Shop Owner

attributes.content: Oh, it's you, Herr Biegler... Sorry, didn't notice you there.
attributes.name: Rude Infected

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Don't mention it.
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: At the end of the day, the Afterglow is an Infected settlement. It's real lively here, but you'll run into plenty who can't be reasoned with. Best be careful out there.
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: Thank you for the reminder.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Here's my business card, with the phone number of my coffee shop on the front side. If you're ever thirsty, give me a call. We deliver too, real fast.
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: By the way, hasn't Andante always been the one in charge of the Rhodes Island office? Did you just get dispatched over here?
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: Actually, I'm here to investigate some strange happenings.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Oh, Mr. Biegler, regarding your condition––
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Strange happenings? What kind of strange are you talking about? I haven't heard a thing.
attributes.name: Biegler

attributes.content: So this is what happened...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: How fares the situation?
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Lachmann's plans proceeded spectacularly.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: Graf Urtica's actions were largely within expectations. Though he did cause some hindrance to Lachmann, it was most likely accidental and did not incur any lasting consequences.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: That's nothing. I never expected Lachmann alone to drive Rhodes Island out of the Afterglow.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: As for Czerny, he already had to expend most of the goodwill he's earned, not to mention copyrights, just to invite those haughty critics to the concert.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: Word also has it that he held his nose and wrote a glowing recommendation for a noble's album that he held nothing but disdain for.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: For someone like him, there's no going back now that he's stooped to this level.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: What about the Sankta from a few days ago? If I remember right, when she applied for entry into the city, she said she came from Laterano to immerse herself in Leithanian culture?
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: According to the records, she concluded her tour around Vyseheim and left earlier today for her next destination.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: So we don't have to worry about her.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Let's go. We should be on our way to Afterglow Hall.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: But our appointment with Czerny isn't until tonight.
attributes.name: Frivolous Noble

attributes.content: There's no shortage of prep work to be done.
attributes.name: Gertrude

attributes.content: Plus, if that one ever decides to head to Afterglow Hall on a whim, our hired muscle won't be enough to stop him. That's when things get troublesome.
attributes.name: Gertrude
